00019 #ifndef HASHTABLE_H
00020 #define HASHTABLE_H
00021 
00022 #include<iostream>
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 struct maillon {
00026         short indice;
00027         short next;
00028 };
00029 
00030 
00031 class hashTable{
00032         public :
00033         // create an hashtable of size tsize that can save at most tn different 
00034         // elements
00035         hashTable(int tn, int tsize) {
00036                 n=tn;
00037                 size=tsize;
00038                 stockMaillon = new maillon[n];
00039                 hash = new int[size];
00040                 clear();
00041         }
00042         
00043         ~hashTable() {
00044                 delete [] stockMaillon;
00045                 delete [] hash;
00046         }
00047         
00048         inline void clear(void) {
00049                 int i;
00050                 for(i = 0 ; i < size ; i++) {
00051                         hash[i] = -1;
00052                 }
00053                 nbMaillonsUtilises = 0;
00054         }
00055         
00056         
00057         inline const int key(const short s, const short * v) {
00058                 unsigned int sum = 0;
00059                 int i;
00060                 for(i = 0 ; i < s ; i++) {
00061                         sum+=(3*sum+v[i]);
00062                 }
00063                 sum = sum%size;
00064                 return sum;
00065         }
00066         
00067         inline int getFirstIndice(const short s, const short * v) {
00068                 currentKey = key(s,v);
00069                 currentMaillon = hash[currentKey];
00070                 if(currentMaillon == -1) return -1;
00071                 return stockMaillon[currentMaillon].indice;
00072         }
00073         
00074         inline int getNextIndice() {
00075                 currentMaillon = stockMaillon[currentMaillon].next;
00076                 return currentMaillon;
00077         }
00078         
00079         inline void insert(short ind) {
00080                 stockMaillon[nbMaillonsUtilises].next=hash[currentKey];
00081                 stockMaillon[nbMaillonsUtilises].indice=ind;
00082                 hash[currentKey]=nbMaillonsUtilises;
00083                 nbMaillonsUtilises++;
00084         }
00085         
00086         protected :
00087         int size;
00088         short n;
00089         maillon * stockMaillon;
00090         int nbMaillonsUtilises;
00091         int * hash;
00092         int currentMaillon;
00093         int currentKey;
00094 };
00095 
00096 #endif
